name: Guardian Spear
description: The spears used by the guards.

name: Guild Carnival Chest
description: Open it to receive Guild's Gift x5, Gold Medal x1

name: Guild Coin
description: The money is used for Guild Cat Box lottery

name: Guild Medal
description: A gold medal that can be used on a guild stone plate.

name: Guild Name Change Card
description: A sacred card sent to Valhalla. If you want to rename your guild, You can write the name you like on it and send it to Valhalla. They will help you modify its name. ღ

name: Guild's Gift
description: We are united! (Use it to gain guild contribution: 25 points)

name: Guillotine Katar [1]
description: It is said that a qualified assassin can use it to easily cut down the target's head.
effect: Doubles Critical,When HP is lower than 25%, caster receives a Bloodthirsty effect: speed up following attacks, damage, damage causes additional HP loss; the effect lasts 10 seconds (CD lasts 120 seconds)

name: Guillotine Katar [2]
description: It is said that a qualified assassin can use it to easily cut down the target's head.
effect: Doubles Critical,When HP is lower than 25%, caster receives a Bloodthirsty effect: speed up following attacks, damage, damage causes additional HP loss; the effect lasts 10 seconds (CD lasts 120 seconds)

name: Guillotine [1]
description: The double-handed sword made by Gladiator for killing purpose. It is of great use in fighting against people.
effect: auto attack has a 10% chance to stun the target,Attack Spd ＋10%

name: Gungnir [2]
description: The spear which will perfectly hit the target, as long as the target is locked.

description: The spear which will perfectly hit the target, as long as the target is locked.

name: Haedonggum [1]
description: The sword made in a remote mysterious east island country is not only used for killing, but also used for personality cultivation.

description: The latest hair design guide published by Miss Celia. Use it to experience the elite adventurer hairstyle in the hair salon.
